yum_params.description: Any additional parameters to include in the yum upgrade command (such as including/excluding repos)

dpkg_params.description: Any additional parameters to include in the dpkg command

zypper_params.description: Any additional parameters to include in the zypper update command

reboot.description: Should the server reboot after patching has been applied? (Defaults to 'never')

timeout.description: How many seconds should we wait until timing out the patch run? (Defaults to 3600 seconds)

patch_filter.description: Limit patches to security_only or critical_only. critical_only is only applicable to windows operating systems (Defaults to nil)

clean_cache.description: Should the yum/dpkg caches be cleaned at the start of the task? (Defaults to false)

description: Carry out OS patching on the server, optionally including a reboot and/or only applying security related updates
